attributes.action: Do not fully open schools and colleges until all staff are vaccinated.
attributes.additional_details: Ensuring the safety of school staff and reduce the risk of transmission to the community.
attributes.background: Schools and colleges have contributed to the surge in covid19 cases. The safety of staff should be a priority, thus vaccination of staff should be prioritised before Schools open.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Don’t re-open schools until all staff have been vaccinated
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572419
